attributes.action: formally recognize Stephen Fry as a bona fide National Treasure
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: With the renewed emphasis on citizenship in the UK, we believe that a figurehead is needed to shine as an example to us all as to what it means to belong to the British nation. We believe that example is concisely summed up in one man - Stephen Fry. A man who shines in film, tv, print, radio, whose erudite knowlege informs us all. Who father was a physicist & inventor. Whose grandparents were Jewish immigrants from Surany, Slovakia. His voice leads us through the Hitchhikers Guide and Harry Potter. He has also recorded audio versions of works by Roald Dahl, Michael Bond, A. A. Milne, Anthony Buckeridge and Douglas Adams, as well as several of his own books. Heck, he's even written a script for a remake of The Dam Busters!

rejection.details: The Cabinet Office is actively seeking nominations for honours from the public. Please go to http://www.honours.gov.uk/
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
